description: Call variants on a set of bam files.

--bam-list.description: A json file containing a list of all BAM files to include.

--out.description: The output file containing the variants.

--use-best-n-alleles.description: Evaluate only the best N SNP alleles, ranked by sum of supporting quality scores.  (Set to 0 to use all; default: all)

--max-complex-gap.description: Allow complex alleles with contiguous embedded matches of up to this length.

--min-alternate-count.description: Require at least this count of observations supporting an alternate allele within a single individual in order to evaluate the position.  default: 1

--min-alternate-qsum.description: Require at least this sum of quality of observation supporting an alternate allele within a single individual in order to evaluate the position.  default: 0

--pvar.description: Report sites if the probability that there is a polymorphism at the site is greater than N.  default: 0.0001

--use-mapping-quality.description: Use mapping quality of alleles when calculating data likelihoods.

--posterior-integration-limits.description: Integrate all genotype combinations in our posterior space which include no more than N samples with their Mth best.

--genotype-variant-threshold.description: Limit posterior integration to samples where the second-best genotype likelihood is no more than log(N) from the highest genotype likelihood for the sample.  default: ~unbounded.

--site-selection-max-iterations.description: Uses hill-climbing algorithm to search posterior space for N iterations to determine if the site should be evaluated.  Set to 0 to prevent use of this algorithm for site selection, and to a low integer for improvide site selection at a slight performance penalty. default: 5.

--genotyping-max-iterations.description: Iterate no more than N times during genotyping step. default: 25.

default.description: The default parameters for short-variant calling.  Assumed low coverage data for a large population.

human.description: The human instance will call on the autosome only using segments of DNA of 1Mbp in length.

tutorial.description: Tutorial instance uses lenient parameters so that variants are discovered with the simulated data.
